Hi. Nice to meet you!

I'm Manny Marx and I like meat stuff. For example this website and even the desk I'm sitting at making this website. However what I really like to do is make music, especially making music with people. Whether it be collaborating musically or creating sounds and music for persons vision, I love it. In fact, I'd say I'm pretty good at it, too. But hey, don't take my word for it, check out what people who have worked with me have to say about it.

Check it out
